Common utils module¶

Common functions and constants used throughout the project.

utils.py¶

Common functions used in both server and client apps.

decorators.py¶

Logging decorators used in the project.

utils.decorators.function_log(func)¶

The decorator function

descriptors.py¶

class utils.descriptors.Port¶

Descriptor class

__set__(instance, value)¶

Sets the name of the Port object.

class utils.errors.NotADictionaryError¶

Exception raised if the data received was not a dictionary, when it was supposed to be a dictionary.

class utils.errors.ServerError(error_message)¶

Exception raised when the server encounters and error.

There can be a custom error text in this exception.
